title: I just want to see, what happens with the Prolific Posters sidebar, when titles are very long: uazzgfaszhf uiazfiuasdzfiudsaz uz
content:
See subject.

As I have assumed. It changes its height. Probably the problem can be solved by defining a maximum height and a rule for the case, that the content wants to overflow.
author: Arno Enslin

comments.content: Depends if this is seen as a problem or not. I think this case you will need to lobby…
It is a problem, because it already happens, when each of the three titles have three lines in the sidebar. Then some of the member avatars is covered by the box, which looks terrible.
